record.description: Begin college career at 13. With other youngsters, Virginia Darrow, 13, or Chicago, registers with La Verne Pray for classes at the University of Chicago. Registering with her are (left to right) David Wallom, 16, of Freeport, Illinois, and Joe Vowell, 16, of Bruston, Tennessee. The students are admitted after a series of tests, and high-school credits are not considered.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
